decks.notes: The main focus of this UW Control deck is to control the game through the use of counterspells, removal, and card advantage. By utilizing cards like Memory Deluge, Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, and Narset, Parter of Veils, the deck aims to outvalue opponents and disrupt their game plan. The deck also includes win conditions like Shark Typhoon and March of Otherworldly Light to close out games once the opponent has been locked down. The mana base and card selection reflect a balanced approach to ensure consistency and flexibility in handling various threats.

This Lotus Field combo deck focuses on quickly assembling the pieces needed to generate a large amount of mana through Lotus Field and various untap effects. By tutoring for key lands like Boseiju, Who Endures and Otawara, Soaring City, and using cards like Spara's Headquarters and Bala Ged Recovery for recursion, the deck can cast game-ending spells like Emergent Ultimatum and Omniscience. Strict Proctor and Archdruid's Charm help protect the combo while also disrupting opponents. Overall, the deck aims to set up a powerful endgame while controlling the board and outpacing opponents efficiently.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quick and aggressive creature plays, utilizing cards like Vein Ripper and Bloodtithe Harvester to quickly overwhelm opponents. The deck also includes powerful cards like Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to control the board and maintain pressure. With a mix of removal spells like Fatal Push and disruption from cards like Thoughtseize, this deck aims to close out games efficiently and decisively. The mana base is set up to support both black and red mana requirements to ensure smooth gameplay and consistent threats.

The deck focuses on utilizing Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion to maximize value from its enter-the-battlefield ability. The main deck consists of a mix of control cards, card draw, removal, and powerful creatures to control the board and outvalue the opponent. The inclusion of Enigmatic Incarnation allows for flexibility in finding answers or threats, while Leyline Binding helps to lock down the opponent's key cards. The mana base is carefully crafted to ensure consistency and support the deck's color requirements.
